# ::snt A powerful ice storm continues to maintain its grip .
(c / continue-01
      :ARG0 (s / storm-01
            :ARG1 (ii / ice)
            :ARG1-of (p / powerful-02))
      :ARG1 (m / maintain-01
            :ARG0 s
            :ARG1 (g / grip-01
                  :ARG0 s)))

# ::snt The Nikkei index was pressured down by profit-taking triggered by sharp advances made through this week and fell 151.20 points to 35527.29 .
(a / and
      :op1 (p / pressure-01
            :ARG0 (t / take-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / profit-01)
                  :ARG1-of (t2 / trigger-01
                        :ARG0 (a2 / advance-01
                              :ARG1-of (s / sharp-02)
                              :time (w / week
                                    :mod (t3 / this)))))
            :ARG1 (ii / index
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Nikkei"))
            :ARG2 (d / down-03
                  :ARG1 ii))
      :op2 (f / fall-01
            :ARG1 ii
            :ARG2 (p3 / point
                  :quant 151.20)
            :ARG3 (p4 / percentage-entity
                  :value 35527.29)))

# ::snt Of the total purchase price , $ 50 million cash and $ 30 million in stock ( nearly 1.8 million shares ) would be paid to buy the existing 700-room Marina Hotel amp Casino from Southwest Securities , a Nevada limited partnership .
(ii / include-91
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (c / cash
                  :quant 50000000)
            :op2 (s / stock
                  :quant 30000000
                  :consist-of (s2 / share
                        :quant (n / nearly
                              :op1 1800000))))
      :ARG2 (m / monetary-quantity
            :ARG2-of (p / price-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / purchase-01))
            :ARG2-of (t / total-01))
      :ARG3 (b / buy-01
            :ARG1 (h / hotel
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Marina"
                        :op2 "Hotel"
                        :op3 "amp"
                        :op4 "Casino")
                  :ARG1-of (e / exist-01)
                  :consist-of (r / room
                        :quant 700))
            :ARG2 (c2 / company
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Southwest"
                        :op2 "Securities")
                  :mod (p3 / partnership
                        :ARG1-of (l / limit-01)
                        :location (s3 / state
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Nevada"))))))

# ::snt Defense Minister Yitzhak Mordechai was the first senior Israeli official to refer to U.N. resolution 425 in a speech six weeks ago , saying at the time he was willing to withdraw troops in exchange for guarantees that Israel would not be attacked .
(r / refer-03
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Yitzhak"
                  :op2 "Mordechai")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (m / minister
                        :topic (d / defend-01)))
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Israel"))
                  :ARG2 (o / official
                        :mod (s / senior)))
            :ARG0-of (s2 / say-01
                  :ARG1 (w / will-02
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (w2 / withdraw-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (t / troop)
                              :ARG1-of (e / exchange-01
                                    :ARG0 p
                                    :ARG3 (g / guarantee-01
                                          :ARG1 (a / attack-01
                                                :polarity -
                                                :ARG1 c)))))
                  :time (b / before
                        :op1 (n3 / now)
                        :quant (t2 / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 6
                              :unit (w3 / week)))))
      :ARG1 (l / law
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "U.N."
                  :op2 "Resolution"
                  :op3 425))
      :time (s3 / speak-01
            :ARG0 p)
      :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity
            :value 1))

      :ARG0 (c / company)
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG1 (p / proceeds
                  :source (o / offer-01))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (r / redeem-01
                        :ARG1 (s2 / share
                              :quant 264000000
                              :ARG1-of (p2 / prefer-01)
                              :mod (m / monetary-quantity
                                    :quant "C"
                                    :unit (d / dollar))))
                  :op2 (r2 / reduce-01
                        :ARG1 (d2 / debt
                              :duration (t / term
                                    :ARG1-of (s3 / short-07)))))))

# ::snt A.L. Williams Corp. was merged into Primerica Corp., New York , after a special meeting of Williams shareholders cleared the transaction , the companies said .

      :ARG0 (c / company
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "A."
                  :op2 "L."
                  :op3 "Williams"
                  :op4 "Corp."))
      :ARG1 (m / merge-01
            :ARG1 c
            :ARG2 (c2 / company
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Primerica"
                        :op2 "Corp.")
                  :location (c3 / city
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "New"
                              :op2 "York")))
            :time (a / after
                  :op1 (c4 / clear-02
                        :ARG0 (m2 / meet-03
                              :ARG0 (p / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h / hold-01
                                          :ARG1 (s2 / share
                                                :poss c)))
                              :ARG1-of (s3 / special-02))
                        :ARG1 (t / transact-01)))))

# ::snt That would be a huge problem if it were to continue , because Unisys is betting its business on the assumption that customers want to move away from using operating systems that run on only one manufacturer 's equipment and toward systems -- mainly Unix -- that work on almost anyone 's machines .
(p / problem
      :mod (h / huge)
      :domain (t / that)
      :condition (c / continue-01
            :ARG1 (ii / it))
      :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (b / bet-01
                  :ARG0 (c3 / company
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Unisys"))
                  :ARG2 (b2 / business
                        :poss c3)
                  :ARG3 (a / assume-02
                        :ARG0 c3
                        :ARG1 (w / want-01
                              :ARG0 (c4 / customer)
                              :ARG1 (m / move-01
                                    :ARG0 c4
                                    :ARG2 (a2 / away
                                          :op1 (u / use-01
                                                :ARG0 c4
                                                :ARG1 (s / system
                                                      :ARG0-of (o / operate-01)
                                                      :ARG1-of (r / run-01
                                                            :location (e / equipment
                                                                  :poss (c5 / company
                                                                        :quant 1
                                                                        :ARG0-of (m2 / manufacture-01))
                                                                  :mod (o2 / only)))))
                                          :op2 (t2 / toward
                                                :op1 (s2 / system
                                                      :mod (m3 / main)
                                                      :mod (t3 / thing
                                                            :name (n2 / name
                                                                  :op1 "Unix"))
                                                      :ARG0-of (w2 / work-07
                                                            :ARG2 (m4 / machine
                                                                  :poss (a3 / anyone
                                                                        :mod (a4 / almost)))))))))))))

      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (o / organization
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Heritage"))
                  :ARG2 (s / spokesman)))
      :ARG1 (ii / issue-01
            :ARG0 o
            :ARG1 (s2 / share
                  :ARG1-of (p2 / prefer-01)
                  :quant (b / between
                        :op1 1800000
                        :op2 3500000))
            :ARG0-of (d / depend-01
                  :ARG1 (n2 / number
                        :quant-of (a / and
                              :op1 (w / warrant)
                              :op2 (o2 / option)
                              :ARG1-of (e2 / exercise-02
                                    :time (p3 / prior
                                          :op1 (c / complete-01
                                                :ARG1 (t / transact-01)))))))))

                                    :op1 "Jaguar"))))))

      :ARG0 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Nhek"
                  :op2 "Bunchhay")
            :ARG1-of (l / loyal-01
                  :ARG2 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Prince"
                              :op2 "Norodom"
                              :op3 "Ranariddh")

                              :ARG1 (c / country
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Cambodia"))
                              :ARG2 (m / minister
                                    :mod (p3 / prime)))
                        :ARG1-of (o / oust-01)))
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (g / general)))
      :ARG1 (h3 / hope-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (r / recover-02
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (r2 / remain-01)
                        :poss (p4 / person
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Christopher"
                                    :op2 "Howes")))
                  :time (a / after
                        :op1 (n5 / now)
                        :quant (u / up-to
                              :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 2
                                    :unit (w / week))))))
      :medium (ii / interview-01
            :ARG0 (p5 / publication
                  :name (n6 / name
                        :op1 "Associated"
                        :op2 "Press"))
            :ARG1 p
            :location (h4 / headquarters
                  :poss p
                  :location (h5 / hilltop))))

                              :quant 713500000
                              :unit (d5 / dollar))

                              :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 9

                                          :value 1)

                                    :part-of (y / year)))))

            :time y
            :mod (t3 / this)))

                  :value 50)

                  :value 75)

                  :op1 (m / monetary-quantity
                        :quant 4500000

                                    :value 4))))))

# ::snt Statistics on acquisitions by foreigners vary in detail , because unlike Sansui , which is listed on the Tokyo and Osaka stock exchanges , most of the Japanese companies acquired by foreigners are privately held .
(v / vary-01
      :ARG1 (s / statistic
            :topic (a / acquire-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :mod (f / foreign))))
      :ARG2 (d / detail)
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (r / resemble-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (h / hold-01
                        :ARG1 (c2 / company
                              :quant (m / most)
                              :mod (c3 / country
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Japan"))
                              :ARG1-of (a2 / acquire-01
                                    :ARG0 p))
                        :ARG1-of (p2 / private-03))
                  :ARG2 (c4 / company
